about_the_game:
Set in 1918, during the tail end of the first World War, go on an adventure in Purgatory, the third realm of the afterlife, as you work to uncover mysteries and defend the dead from eternal damnation.

Outlawyer tells the story of Ned Kelly, formerly Australia's most notorious outlaw, now working as a defence attorney defending the souls of the recently deceased. When someone dies, their soul faces trial and their entire life is put on review for their every sin to be judged. It's your job as the defence to speak on your client's behalf and show they can be redeemed. You will also take on the role of Azazel, a newly fallen angel who joins Ned on his adventures as his apprentice.

Features: -Prove your opponents wrong in exhilarating trials that cross realms and challenge assumptions in the pursuit of salvation.

-Gorgeous and expressive hand drawn artwork for the entire game

-An original score that is both orchestral and otherworldly 

-Unique minigames in trials that get you ever closer to the truth

-Explore the dreary streets of Purgatory, a world where countless eras overlap.

-Discover and build bonds with historical icons dating back to antiquity. -Gather all your deductive prowess to uncover not just your client's salvation, but the secrets of the afterlife lying just below the surface.

Outlawyer is currently in it's fundraising stage, and a demo will be released soon here on Steam.

*All the characters depicted are fictional even if they are inspired by real historical and biblical figures. Any events that happen in game are fictional events for the story and may not reflect real life.

content_descriptors.notes: May contain violent depictions of deaths and murder as you review the lives of the deceased.

short_description: An upcoming visual novel set in purgatory during World War 1, Take the role of Ned Kelly, former Australian outlaw turned lawyer, and the fallen angel Azazel, his partner and apprentice, as you help save souls from eternal damnation, while uncovering a mystery of biblical proportions!
